title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / messy room after lely tape
description: Kim's reaction to the mess in your room after you've listened to tape and he was present etc.

dialogueTree.title: Empathy: "Kim also tries *not* to look at the..."
dialogueTree.english: Kim also tries *not* to look at the pile of tape viscera on the carpet. Or the weird suitcase on the hat rack. Or the potted plant dying in the corner. But it's all just too morbid to ignore.
dialogueTree.polish: Kim stara się *nie spoglądać* na przypominający wnętrzności zwitek taśmy na podłodze. I na dziwną walizkę na wieszaku. Oraz na usychającą roślinę doniczkową w rogu. Ale wszystko to jest zbyt makabryczne, aby to zignorować.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Кім стараецца *не зіркаць* на скручаны вузел стужкі, якая нагадвае вантробы, на падлозе. І на дзіўны чамадан на вешалцы. А таксама на засыхаючую пакаёвую расліна ў куце. Але ўсё гэта занадта жахліва, каб гэта ігнараваць.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "The man is finding it hard not to t..."
links.english: The man is finding it hard not to trip on the tape -- and not to send any of the bottles rolling across the floor...
links.polish: Trudno mu jest nie potknąć się o taśmę. Ani nie kopnąć żadnej z butelek na podłodze...
links.belarusian: Яму цяжка не спатыкнуцца аб стужку. І не штурхнуць ніводнай з бутэлек на падлозе...

links.title: Endurance: "...where unidentifiable sludge make..."
links.english: ...where unidentifiable sludge makes it hard for him to breathe. Smells of vomit in here.
links.polish: ...a rozlana, nieznanego pochodzenia kałuża prawie uniemożliwia mu oddychanie. Cuchnie tu wymiocinami.
links.belarusian: ...разлітае, невядомага паходжання лужына амаль немагчымае яму дыханне. Смярдзіць ванітавымі масамі.

links.title: You: ""You're looking at the destruction?""
links.english: "You're looking at the destruction?"
links.polish: „Oceniasz zniszczenia?”
links.belarusian: "Ацэньваеш разбурэнні?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods."
links.english: He nods.
links.polish: Kiwa głową.
links.belarusian: Ківае галавой.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry for... this.""
links.english: "I'm sorry for... this."
links.polish: „Przepraszam... za to”.
links.belarusian: "Прабачце... за гэта".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No problem, officer." He takes a s..."
links.english: "No problem, officer." He takes a step toward the door. Like he'd like to leave.
links.polish: „Żaden problem, oficerze” – odpowiada, po czym robi krok w kierunku drzwi. Jakby chciał już stąd wyjść.
links.belarusian: "Няма праблем, афіцэр" — адказвае ён, а пасля робіць крок у бок дзвярэй. Як быццам хоча ўжо адсюль выйсці.

links.title: You: ""I did it -- my way.""
links.english: "I did it -- my way."
links.polish: „Zrobiłem to. Po swojemu”.
links.belarusian: "Я зрабіў гэта. Па-свойму."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can see that." He takes a step t..."
links.english: "I can see that." He takes a step toward the door. "You're the RCM's own Soldier of the Apocalypse, aren't you?"
links.polish: „Widzę” – odpowiada, robiąc krok w kierunku drzwi. „Jesteś służącym w szeregach MOR-u żołnierzem apokalipsy, prawda?”
links.belarusian: "Бачу", — адказвае ён, робячы крок у напрамку дзвярэй. "Ты служыш у шэрагах РГМ як жаўнер апакаліпсісу, праўда?"

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.english: "Yes."
links.polish: „Tak”.
links.belarusian: "Так".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wonderful," he nods, then looks to..."
links.english: "Wonderful," he nods, then looks toward the exit, longingly.
links.polish: „Cudownie” – kiwa głową, a następnie spogląda tęsknie w kierunku wyjścia.
links.belarusian: "Цудоўна", — ківае галавой, а затым тужліва глядзіць у бок выхада.

links.title: You: ""No. I am something *much more*.""
links.english: "No. I am something *much more*."
links.polish: „Nie. Jestem czymś *o wiele większym*”.
links.belarusian: "Не. Я з"яўляюся нечым *значна большым*".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course." He nods, then looks lo..."
links.english: "Of course." He nods, then looks longingly toward the exit.
links.polish: „Oczywiście” – kiwa głową i spogląda tęsknie w kierunku wyjścia.
links.belarusian: "Вядома", — ківае галавой і пазірае з тугой у бок выхаду.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can see that." He takes a step t..."
links.english: "I can see that." He takes a step toward the door. It looks like he'd like to leave now. The atmosphere is oppressive.
links.polish: „Widzę” – odpowiada, robiąc krok w kierunku drzwi. Zdaje się, że chciałby już stąd wyjść. W pokoju panuje przytłaczająca atmosfera.
links.belarusian: "Бачу", – адказвае ён, робячы крок у бок дзвярэй. Здаецца, ён хацеў бы ўжо адсюль выйсці. У пакоі пануе прыгнятальная атмасфера.

links.title: You: ""Got my own little Co Hoi here.""
links.english: "Got my own little Co Hoi here."
links.polish: „Mam tu swoje własne Co Hoi”.
links.belarusian: "У мяне тут сваё ўласнае Co Hoi".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can see that. The potted plant u..."
links.english: "I can see that. The potted plant under the table is a Seraise Fern. They have those in South Safre too. All things considered..." He looks around, as if to check.
links.polish: „Widzę. Ta doniczkowa roślina pod stołem to serajska paproć. W Południowym Safre też je mają. Ogólnie rzecz biorąc...” – rozgląda się, oceniając sytuację.
links.belarusian: "Бачу. Гэта пакаёвая расліна пад сталом — серайская папараць. На Паўднёвым Сафрэ таксама іх маюць. Увогуле кажучы..." — азіраецца, ацэньваючы сітуацыю.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not as bad as I thought. Ther..."
links.english: "It's not as bad as I thought. There are no elephant corpses. Should we go maybe?"
links.polish: „Nie jest tak źle, jak myślałem. Nie ma trupów słoni. Może już pójdziemy?”
links.belarusian: "Не так дрэнна, як я думаў. Няма трупаў сланоў. Можа, мы ўжо пойдзем?"

links.title: You: ""This is where *the magic* happens.""
links.english: "This is where *the magic* happens."
links.polish: „To tutaj dzieje się *magia*”.
links.belarusian: "Тут адбываецца *магія*".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And by that you mean crimes agains..."
links.english: "And by that you mean crimes against humanity?"
links.polish: „Masz na myśli zbrodnie przeciwko ludzkości?”
links.belarusian: "Вы маеце на ўвазе злачынствы супраць чалавецтва?"

links.title: You: ""Yes. Disco doorgunning villagers.""
links.english: "Yes. Disco doorgunning villagers."
links.polish: „Tak. Discorozstrzeliwanie wieśniaków”.
links.belarusian: "Так. Дыскстрэлянне вяскоўцаў".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have no idea what that means." H..."
links.english: "I have no idea what that means." He looks toward the exit, longingly.
links.polish: „Nie mam pojęcia, co to znaczy” – odpowiada, spoglądając tęsknie w kierunku wyjścia.
links.belarusian: "Я не маю паняцця, што гэта азначае", — адказвае ён, гледзячы з тугою ў бок выхаду.

links.title: You: ""Well, crimes against myself anyway.""
links.english: "Well, crimes against myself anyway."
links.polish: „No, bardziej zbrodnie przeciwko sobie”.
links.belarusian: "Не, больш злачынствы супраць сябе".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have no idea what that means." H..."
links.english: "I have no idea what that means." He looks toward the exit, longingly.
links.polish: „Nie mam pojęcia, co to znaczy” – odpowiada, spoglądając tęsknie w kierunku wyjścia.
links.belarusian: "Я не маю паняцця, што гэта значыць", — адказвае ён, з тугою гледзячы ў бок выхаду.

links.title: You: ""I defied bourgeoisie morality in h..."
links.english: "I defied bourgeoisie morality in here. Defied it *hard*."
links.polish: „Odrzuciłem tu burżuazyjną moralność. Odrzuciłem *z całej siły*”.
links.belarusian: "Я адкінуў тут буржуазную мараль. Адкінуў *з усёй сілы*".

links.title: You: ""This is an expression of *me*. My..."
links.english: "This is an expression of *me*. My individualism."
links.polish: „To ekspresja *mnie samego*. Mojego indywidualizmu”.
links.belarusian: "Гэта выказванне *самога сябе*. Майго індывідуалізму".

links.title: You: ""No, I meant disco... never mind.""
links.english: "No, I meant disco... never mind."
links.polish: „Nie, chodziło mi o disco... Nieważne”.
links.belarusian: "Не, я меў на ўвазе дыска... Не важна".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I know what you meant." He looks t..."
links.english: "I know what you meant." He looks toward the exit, longingly.
links.polish: „Wiem, co miałeś na myśli” – odpowiada, spoglądając tęsknie w kierunku wyjścia.
links.belarusian: "Я ведаю, што ты меў на ўвазе", — адказвае ён, з тужлівым позіркам глядзючы ў бок выйсця.

links.title: You: "Say nothing. Nod stoically."
links.english: Say nothing. Nod stoically.
links.polish: Nic nie mów. Kiwnij stoicko głową.
links.belarusian: Нічога не кажы. Стаічна кіўні галавой.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He takes a step toward the door. Li..."
links.english: He takes a step toward the door. Like he'd like to leave.
links.polish: Robi krok w kierunku drzwi. Jakby chciał już stąd wyjść.
links.belarusian: Робіць крок у напрамку дзвярэй. Як быццам хацеў ужо адсюль выйсці.
